001package edu.pdx.cs410J.phonebill;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.AppointmentBookDumper;
004import edu.pdx.cs410J.PhoneBillDumper;
005
006import java.io.IOException;
007import java.io.PrintWriter;
008import java.io.Writer;
009
010public class TextDumper implements PhoneBillDumper<PhoneBill> {
011  private final Writer writer;
012
013  public TextDumper(Writer writer) {
014    this.writer = writer;
015  }
016
017  @Override
018  public void dump(PhoneBill bill) {
019    try (
020      PrintWriter pw = new PrintWriter(this.writer)
021    ) {
022      pw.println(bill.getCustomer());
023
024      pw.flush();
025    }
026  }
027}
